+ Wikid Pad Help

++ Description

WikidPad is a [wiki]-like notebook for storing your thoughts, ideas,
TodoItems, contacts or anything else you can think of that's
important.  What makes WikidPad different from other notepad or
outliner applications is the ease with which you can cross-link your
information.  WikiLinks in a wiki are created by typing in WikiWords.
A WikiWord is any mixed case word typed into the editor.  TodoItem or
JohnDoe are examples of WikiWords.
[Wikis] are all about quickly linking your information together.
To activate or follow a WikiWord link, just *double click on it*, or type
[Ctrl-L] when the cursor is in the word.

While you are reading through this help document select "Wiki/New"
from the menu at the top of the application window to create your own wiki.
Then just start typing text with WikiWords to build your own Wiki.

++ Features

    * On the fly WikiWordLinking
    * WikiWords can be CamelCase, [not Camel Case] or WIKIDPADWords.
    * UrlLinking with [absolute URL]s and [relative URL]s
    * [Anchors], [Footnotes] and [Bookmarks]
